monoly.label: Monoly

feature.productive.title: Seamless collaboration

new.discussion.page.page.heading: Use discussions to align with internal and external collaborators on topics, tasks, or decisions.
new.discussion.page.audit.requirement: Add requirements for auditing, extra data control, or confidentiality agreement
new.discussion.page.monoly.privacy: Monoly will never collect or store any data shared in a discussion.
new.discussion.page.secure.communication: Secure communication, free of 3rd party oversight

discussion.agreement.lock.heading: Discussion owners can lock and archive this discussion at any time.
discussion.agreement.lock.description: Once locked, this discussion will no longer be accessible or editable. You will be notified if and when this happens. Discussion data is owned by two organizations
discussion.agreement.permanent.delete.heading: Discussion owners can permanently delete this discussion at any time.
discussion.agreement.permanent.delete.description: Once deleted, this discussion will no longer be accessible. You will be notified if and when this happens. All traces of discussion data will be removed from two organizations.
discussion.agreement.advance.security.protocol: This discussion has Advanced Security protocols. You can participate once you accept the terms of this agreement
discussion.agreement.collaborator.invitation: invited you as a contributor to this discussion
discussion.agreement.confidential.heading: this discussion is confidential
discussion.agreement.confidential.description: Do not share Information or data from this discussion with anyone outside of this discussion.

list.item.retain.tamper.proof: Retain tamper-proof data on your own servers for compliance or e-discovery
list.item.retain.the.right: Retain the right to remove all traces of discussion data from external servers

additional.controls.title: Additional controls (optional)

additional.controls.leaves.data.trail: Leaves a data trail for auditing or e-discovery.

additional.controls.locked.discussion.is.saved: A locked discussion is saved in a tamper-proof, read-only state on all discussion owners’ servers
additional.controls.owner.can.delete: An owner can permanently delete this discussion at any time
additional.controls.deleted.discussion.is.lost: A deleted discussion is no longer visible to any collaborators and is deleted from all servers
